Text: Mexican Werewolf in Texas is a 2005 horror film directed by Scott Maginnis.

Triplets:<Mexican Werewolf in Texas
1:
--------------------
Text: Mexican Werewolf in Texas:  The title is a reference to the 1981 horror comedy film "An American Werewolf in London", which was written and directed by John Landis and is in turn a possible reference to the 1928 symphonic poem "An American in Paris".
Triplets:<Mexican Werewolf in Texas
